ContainerSettings.Title: Stock Availability
ContainerSettings.Description: Get the aggregated view about your Stock with respect to Product, Item, and Department. Do Sort and Filter to have limited data displayed based on your need.

ContainerSettings.Title: Inventory Turn Over Ratio
ContainerSettings.Description: The inventory turnover ratio is calculated by dividing the cost of goods sold for a period by the average inventory for that period.

ContainerSettings.Title: Gross Margin ROI
ContainerSettings.Description: Gross Margin Return on Investment (GMROI): It analyzes a companyâs ability to turn inventory into cash, above the cost of the inventory.

ContainerSettings.Title: Top selling Items
ContainerSettings.Description: Top selling items based on the no of items sold.

ContainerSettings.Title: Purchase Order Details
ContainerSettings.Description: List of purchase order details shows product name, quantity, supplier name, order date, and expected date.

ContainerSettings.Title: Average Inventory Value by Product Category
ContainerSettings.Description: Average Inventory value is computed by averaging the starting and ending inventory values over a specific time period. Drilldown any one pie slice to view the Average Inventory value for items of a specific product.

ContainerSettings.Title: Returned Items by Product Category
ContainerSettings.Description: Shows the no of items, which the customers have returned in each product category by its reason.
